title: NEW RANK SYSTEM IS DESTROYING MY GAMES MORE THEN OLD SYSTEM
body: In the beginning everything was good. Yes a couple of high ellos here and there but playable cause they were silver 2 or gold 3 higher. But now that im in silver 3 please explain to me all the plat and diamonds in my games???? if im correct if they have a plat player on there team i should have a equal teammate as his laner. But nah this is plat going up against bronze. and this didnt happen once but 3 times already, and i notice something very interesting threw these games. the higher ranks were always duo. I dont see how this is fair and would like riot to fix this bullsh*t.

replies.body:
Is this soloq? Because that doesn't sound right at all. 
If it's flex thats pretty normal since flex and soloq do not run on the same MMR.

> [{quoted}](name=Ingénue,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=Z9wRpuZs,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2019-02-21T10:24:33.495+0000)
>
> Is this soloq? Because that doesn't sound right at all. 
> If it's flex thats pretty normal since flex and soloq do not run on the same MMR.

Solo and duo are linked.

But solo and flex are not. Someone who is Diamond in solo (which is what will show on sites like op.gg) might have never played flex and so is in the silver~ bracket.

Given that OP posted from a level 1 account, we're lacking pretty much all the information to detail why this would/could have happened.

> [{quoted}](name=Seras Dragon,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=Z9wRpuZs,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2019-02-23T13:03:08.905+0000)
>
> But solo and flex are not. Someone who is Diamond in solo (which is what will show on sites like op.gg) might have never played flex and so is in the silver~ bracket.
> 
> Given that OP posted from a level 1 account, we're lacking pretty much all the information to detail why this would/could have happened.

Not sure what you mean when you can duo queue in solo queue. No idea, though.

Even with people duoing in soloq there is no way a plat/diamond is in a silver game. 
In flex it would be normal due to the reason Seras stated.
